tool_description: An API the brings to you the lyrics you want
title: Lyrics Finder

api_list.name: Get artist's song lyric
api_list.description: Get the specific artist's song lyric by artist name and song name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lyrics-finder1.p.rapidapi.com/{artistname}/{songname}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lyrics-finder1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all artists
api_list.description: Get all artist by the first letter artit's name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lyrics-finder1.p.rapidapi.com/artists/name/{firstletterartistname}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lyrics-finder1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all artist's musics
api_list.description: Get all artist's musics by the artist's name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lyrics-finder1.p.rapidapi.com/artists/{artistname}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lyrics-finder1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
